channel.title: Dropreset help
channel.description: how can i do this by entering a command and removing all drops on the ground? source deltascape

item.title: Dropreset help
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Make a command that loops an array of the items around you and make it clear them.

Read full topic

item.title: Dropreset help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“xxDiluted2xx, post:15, topic:286092”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=378377.msg2846639#msg2846639 date=1246316976]

Something like this?

else if (command.startsWith("removedrops")) {
            removeAllItemsOnGround();
        }

Tell me if it helps.

You’re calling a method that is nonexistent.
[/quote]

I just typed something in, as I said, I didn’t test it, so I wouldn’t know.[/quote]
There would be no point in testing it. The method is nonexistent…

Read full topic

item.title: Dropreset help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“xxDiluted2xx, post:4, topic:286092”]There are ways to make that dissapear without a command, like a lava cape or say so?

    public int removeItem(int removeID) {
        if (removeID == #### || removeID == #### || removeID == ####
                || removeID == ####) {
            return 2349;
        }

Replace the ##'s with the item id, you can add more items to it. A little c&p. Tell me if that helps or works.[/quote]
i want a command that will remove all drops on the ground (ALL)

Read full topic

item.title: Dropreset help
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

There are ways to make that dissapear without a command, like a lava cape or say so?

    public int removeItem(int removeID) {
        if (removeID == #### || removeID == #### || removeID == ####
                || removeID == ####) {
            return 2349;
        }

Replace the ##'s with the item id, you can add more items to it. A little c&p. Tell me if that helps or works.

Read full topic
